Palo_Alto.Pacific Shores Center:
Pacific Shores Center is a high-tech business park located in Redwood City, California, adjacent to the Port of Redwood City.


== History ==
The property that Pacific Shores Center was developed on had many uses through the years from part of the Redwood City Harbor Company to cement production to being part of saltworks with Leslie Salt. In 1990 the Teachers' Retirement System of the State of Illinois bought 116 acres (47 ha) of land adjacent to the Port of Redwood City and Westpoint Slough and formed the Pacific Shores Center Partnership to develop it.
